title: Abdulaziz Al-Buloushi
text: Abdulaziz Hasan Al-Buloushi (born 4 December 1962) is a <a href="Kuwait">Kuwait</a>i <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="Midfielder%20%28association%20football%29">forward</a> who played for <a href="Kuwait%20national%20football%20team">Kuwait</a> in the <a href="1982%20FIFA%20World%20Cup">1982 FIFA World Cup</a>. He also played for <a href="Qadsia%20SC%20%28Kuwait%29">Qadsia SC</a>.
